I usually get a sweeper as a mid laner, get a vision trinket as a top laner, and get a scrying orb as adc or sweeper as support, while jungling i get a sweeper too. I switch to red trinket as soon as I finish sightstone, but until that I use yellow. Never found a use for blue, could you maybe help with that?

Blue is best on marksmen who cannot afford to lose vision when someone steps into a bush because of their auto attack reliance, and because it lets you check a bush from further away than a ward would. Trying to ward a bush that an enemy is in as a marksmen is basically suicide, so blue trinket lets you check it from a safe distance.
